root: ^A lone survivor stands outside, clutching a wound on their arm.
^"Move along. I don’t take in strays."

Introduction: ^The survivor exhales sharply, "I was with a group, but we got attacked. I got separated. I just need a place to stay."
WoundCheck: ^"It's not a bite. Just a scratch from barbed wire when I ran."
^You see blood slowly roll down their arm.
TrustCheck: ^"I can fight. Let me stay, and I’ll help defend this place at night."
^"If you turn me away, I’ll probably die out here."
Decision: ^"Alright, you can stay. But if you cause trouble, you're out."
^"I’m sorry. I have to think about my own survival first."

c-0: ^"Thank you... I swear, you won’t regret this. I just—I just need a chance to survive."

Reject: ^"Seriously? After everything I’ve been through, you’re just throwing me back out there? Fine. I’ll remember this when your luck runs out."
